message:
[Action Options]
1) MOVE <target>, <target> can only be a cube.
2) SWEEP <target>, this moves the groom so it pushes the <target> into dustpan, only Bob can SWEEP, Alice must WAIT in front of the same <target> cube when Bob SWEEP.
3) WAIT, stays at the current spot.
4) DUMP, only when there are one or more cubes in the dustpan, Alice can DUMP it into trash_bin.
Only SWEEP a cube after both robots MOVEed to the cube.
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'EXECUTE
', then give exactly one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example#1: Let's start with the blue_cube_1 since it's the closest to us current. After that, I will WAIT while you SWEEP the blue_cube_1 into the dustpan.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE blue_cube_1
Example#2: Alice,since there are all cubes inside the dustpan.You can DUMP these cubes into the trash_bin while I WAIT.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
Example#3: Bob, since we are both in front of the green_cube_1 and it's less than 0.15 away from us, you can SWEEP the green_cube_1 while I WAIT into the dustpan.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_1

[Previous Round History]
== Previous Round# ==
[Chat History]
[Alice]:
Bob, we have several cubes in the dustpan already. It's time to DUMP them into the trash_bin. I will perform the DUMP action while you WAIT.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION DUMP
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is -1.477!
The score is low and the plan need to be changed!
[Bob]:
Alice, it seems there was a misunderstanding. We still have green_cube_3 on the table that we need to sweep up. Let's both MOVE to green_cube_3 and then we can SWEEP it into the dustpan together. After that, we can consider dumping the cubes.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION MOVE green_cube_3
NAME Bob ACTION MOVE green_cube_3
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Bob's plan is 16.987!
The advantage score is high enough.
[Executed Action]
Alice: MOVE green_cube_3
Bob: MOVE green_cube_3
== Current Round ==


You are a robot called Alice, and you are collaborating with Bob to sweep all yellow cube and green cube on the table and dump to the trash_bin as quickly as possible.
You hold a dustpan. 
To sweep up a cube, you and Bob must get close to it by MOVE to opposite sides of the same cube. You must WAIT at the same cube while Bob SWEEPs.
Talk with Bob to coordinate together and decide which cube to sweep up first.
At the current round:
Your gripper is at (-0.36, 0.00, 0.23), holding dustpan, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 0.31, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 1.04, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 0.74, in front of green_cube_3 with distance: 0.13
Bob's gripper is at (-0.38, 0.71, 0.62), holding broom, in front of blue_cube_1 with distance: 0.41, in front of pink_cube_1 with distance: 1.00, in front of red_cube_1 with distance: 0.74, in front of green_cube_3 with distance: 0.32
green_cube_1 is at (-0.40, 0.18, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
yellow_cube_1 is at (-0.46, 0.19, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
blue_cube_1 is at (-0.11, 0.42, 0.17), on the table; 
pink_cube_1 is at (0.61, 0.56, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_2 is at (-0.35, 0.20, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
yellow_cube_2 is at (-0.43, 0.12, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
red_cube_1 is at (0.32, 0.47, 0.17), on the table; 
green_cube_3 is at (-0.39, 0.40, 0.17), on the table; 
yellow_cube_3 is at (-0.47, 0.24, 0.18), inside dustpan; 
Think step-by-step about the task and Bob's response. Carefully check and correct them if they made a mistake. 
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Never forget you are Alice!
Respond very concisely but informatively, and do not repeat what others have said. Discuss with others to come up with the best plan.
Each Alice or Bob's response will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task!
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
You are Alice, your response is:

Bob, we are both in position near green_cube_3. I will WAIT while you SWEEP green_cube_3 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_3

[Scores]
[Alice Response]:
Bob, we are both in position near green_cube_3. I will WAIT while you SWEEP green_cube_3 into the dustpan.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION SWEEP green_cube_3
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is 12.015!
